entity_name: Forced Air Drying Oven BJPX-HG Series
description:
Application:
This product is used for drying, disinfecting, melting wax and sterilizing non-flammable and non-explosive items and non-volatile items in industrial and mining colleges and universities, enterprises, scientific research, food processing, medical institutions and various laboratories. For example, drying of experimental samples, food, glassware, thermal hardening, thermal denaturation, thermal softening and water removal of chemical substances, dry heat sterilization of instruments and utensils in bioengineering, aging and drying of electronic components, etc.

Features：

1. LCD display screen, with built-in temperature deviation calibration function.

2. The inner tank is made of high-quality stainless steel, with semi-circular four-corner design.

3. It has an over-temperature alarm system function to prevent damage to the instrument due to excessive temperature.

4. The unique thermal circulation circuit has a fan to form forced convection, so that the average temperature in the working room is better.

5. The perspective window structure design is convenient for observing the internal situation of the equipment.

6. Good thermal insulation performance and low surface temperature of the equipment. MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Incubators & Ovens in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Incubators & Ovens with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
